Capping and scaling back by local authority

{% if scenario == '2' %}

Does the local authority apply capping and scaling back to your funding gains to make the funding formula affordable?

Yes

Did the school open in the past 7 years and does it have year groups without any pupils?

Yes

Your academy is growing. There are no capping and scaling back adjustment (opens in new tab) to your minimum funding guarantee.

{% else %}

Does the local authority apply capping and scaling back to your funding gains to make the funding formula affordable?

No

There is no capping and scaling back adjustment (opens in new tab) to your minimum funding guarantee.

{% endif %}

Where places come from

Places are either rolled forward from 2022 to 2023 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.

Places are either rolled forward from 2022 to 2023 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.
